title: Playing Warwick makes you really damn bloodthirsty
body:
Just by "Blood Hunt" kicking in.

Seriously, you just want to go out there and rip some fool's throat out.
THAT'S some impressive thematic delivery right there.

Note that it may lead you to certain death though as I've experienced on the PBE.
As easy as his towerdiving might look you might just bite off more than you can chew (hue!) and die.

Basically; if you play WW play with music and sound at the highest setting.
You won't regret it (but your enemies might)

replies.body:
What do you MEAN im not supposed to run directly through the frontline?

There is quite clearly a low health ADC back there and I NEED his blood.
its the same as when someone steps in your cait trap, when you are sitting at 4 stack as annie, or 4 shot as jhin. when you get these massive boosts and visual effects, you just want to use them man

Getting a fully charged Q with Sion or just exploding his shield. 

http://i.imgur.com/6f38ydA.png

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AtFXFeyt,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-01-12T18:44:54.223+0000)
>
> Getting a fully charged Q with Sion or just exploding his shield. 
> 
> http://i.imgur.com/6f38ydA.png

Nothing in this game satisfies me more than a fully successful long Sion charge late game. Where I somehow managed to dodge their team, weave through broken, or still alive, turrets, AND SLAM INTO THAT WEAK, SOFT, SQUISHY APC OR ADC! SMASH! BASH! CRASH! HAHAHAHA! CRUSH PUNY WEAKLING!!!

Maybe it's just because I'm still practicing, but exploding his shield feels good only because I can't ever seem to explode it before it being popped :/
Fully charged Q is definitely great though.
Its just that its always popped
If you want to use it offensively, start it right before engaging.

I've been seeing other meme images similar to this one.
What's the original source for that face and fingers?
Pretty intrigued.

Something about it just allures me to stare!
I can't stop looking. There was a Jhin one too.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AtFXFeyt,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-01-12T18:44:54.223+0000)
>
> Getting a fully charged Q with Sion or just exploding his shield. 
> 
> http://i.imgur.com/6f38ydA.png

this is now a satisfying reason to go in thread. ult up ever{{champion:54}}
{{champion:24}} R up ever (warning defense though advertised as strong is shit if you arent in a battle that was even in the first place or that you were winning in the first place)
.....They need to optimize {{item:3072}}  for WW, there is a clear need for this.

{{champion:17}} when you land that Q on {{champion:67}} and you one shot her with it.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1mFCoQa_0yw/hqdefault.jpg
i mean it pretty much envelops your whole screen its kinda annoying may just chase the kill just to get it off my screen
I really really wish I had a PBE account now.
